title: Bella Thorne, 22, parties with Paris Hilton, 38, as she celebrates launch of her cannabis brand
text:
Bella Thorne celebrated her brand new cannabis brand right alongside the original party princess, Paris Hilton.

The 22-year-old was spotted leaving the launch party of her latest venture, Forbidden Flowers, hand in hand with Paris, 38, in Los Angeles on Thursday night.

The ladies seemed to have really hit it off as they marked Bella's big achievement alongside her boyfriend, Benjamin Mascolo.

Party pals! Bella Thorne celebrated her new cannabis brand Forbidden Flowers with Paris Hilton in Los Angeles on Thursday

The actress made her exit from the bash holding hands with Paris, who followed close behind.

Paris wore a plunging butterfly print dress, ankle boots, red tint shades, and her hair piled up into a loose bun.

Bella, meanwhile, took a walk on the wild side in a red, leopard print jumpsuit with a leather cap atop her long white locks.

The actress was decked out in accessories, including red cat eye sunglasses and layers of silver necklaces.

Let's go girls: Thorne left the bash holding hands with the heiress

At one point, Bella made time for her new boyfriend Benjamin.

The actress is in a polyamorous relationship with Benjamin and another mystery woman, who was seen snuggling Bella in a recent Instagram snap.

That woman did not appear to be with Bella that night, though Bella enjoyed some cuddles with Benjamin.

Showing him some love: At one point, Bella made time for her new boyfriend Benjamin

Let's get this show on the road: Thorne Instagram storied away from inside her car that night

Bella, meanwhile, had another reason to celebrate on Thursday aside from her new loves.

The actress has launched Forbidden Flowers, a new cannabis brand set to be released this fall.

The new venture is a collaboration between Bella and Glass House Group and offers Sativa, Hybrid, Indica, and CBD varieties.

'I have struggled with anxiety for many years, and weed was the one source I found for me to do the most healing,' Bella said in a press release. 'Because of the properties in weed, I have been able to cope with my anxiety in a natural way, rather than my doctors trying to fix it using prescription drugs.'
description: The socialite, 38, hit it off with Bella, 22, while attending the launch of her new cannabis brand, Forbidden Flowers, in Los Angeles on Thursday.
